% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	&& \color{rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,58}{0} && \color{rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,58}{0} && \color{rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,58}{0} \\
	& 0 & \color{rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,58}{(-, K)} && \color{rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,58}{(-, X)} && \color{rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,58}{(-, Y)} \\
	0 & \color{rgb,255:red,51;green,54;blue,255}{K \otimes  DP_0(-)} & \color{rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,58}{(P_0 (-), K)} & \color{rgb,255:red,51;green,54;blue,255}{X \otimes  DP_0(-)} & \color{rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,58}{(P_0 (-), X)} & \color{rgb,255:red,51;green,54;blue,255}{Y \otimes  DP_0(-)} & \color{rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,58}{(P_0 (-), Y)} & 0 \\
	0 & \color{rgb,255:red,51;green,54;blue,255}{K \otimes  DP_1(-)} & \color{rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,58}{(P_1 (-), K)} & \color{rgb,255:red,51;green,54;blue,255}{X \otimes  DP_1(-)} & \color{rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,58}{(P_1 (-), X)} & \color{rgb,255:red,51;green,54;blue,255}{Y \otimes  DP_1(-)} & \color{rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,58}{(P_1 (-), Y)} & 0 \\
	& \color{rgb,255:red,51;green,54;blue,255}{K \otimes \operatorname{Tr}(-)} && \color{rgb,255:red,51;green,54;blue,255}{X \otimes \operatorname{Tr}(-)} && \color{rgb,255:red,51;green,54;blue,255}{Y \otimes \operatorname{Tr}(-)} & 0 \\
	& \color{rgb,255:red,51;green,54;blue,255}{0} && \color{rgb,255:red,51;green,54;blue,255}{0} && \color{rgb,255:red,51;green,54;blue,255}{0}
	\arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,58}, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,58}, from=1-5, to=2-5]
	\arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,58}, from=1-7, to=2-7]
	\arrow[from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow[from=2-3, to=2-5]
	\arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,58}, from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow[from=2-5, to=2-7]
	\arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,58}, from=2-5, to=3-5]
	\arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,58}, from=2-7, to=3-7]
	\arrow[from=3-1, to=3-2]
	\arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,51;green,54;blue,255}, from=3-2, to=4-2]
	\arrow["\sim"', equals, from=3-3, to=3-2]
	\arrow[from=3-3, to=3-4]
	\arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,58}, from=3-3, to=4-3]
	\arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,51;green,54;blue,255}, from=3-4, to=4-4]
	\arrow["\sim"', equals, from=3-5, to=3-4]
	\arrow[from=3-5, to=3-6]
	\arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,58}, from=3-5, to=4-5]
	\arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,51;green,54;blue,255}, from=3-6, to=4-6]
	\arrow["\sim"', equals, from=3-7, to=3-6]
	\arrow[from=3-7, to=3-8]
	\arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,58}, from=3-7, to=4-7]
	\arrow[from=4-1, to=4-2]
	\arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,51;green,54;blue,255}, from=4-2, to=5-2]
	\arrow["\sim"', equals, from=4-3, to=4-2]
	\arrow[from=4-3, to=4-4]
	\arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,51;green,54;blue,255}, from=4-4, to=5-4]
	\arrow["\sim"', equals, from=4-5, to=4-4]
	\arrow[from=4-5, to=4-6]

	\arrow["\sim"', equals, from=4-7, to=4-6]
	\arrow[from=4-7, to=4-8]
	\arrow[from=5-2, to=5-4]
	\arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,51;green,54;blue,255}, from=5-2, to=6-2]
